WKHS VIDEOs HorseFly by Workhorse Drone Delivery Concept youtubecomwatchvepqZIu Workhorse Horsefly Autonomous Drone Package Delivery youtubecomwatchvjvkqc2b UPS Demo of Workhorse HorseFly TruckLaunched Delivery Drone youtubecomwatchvHEkHhZD Workhorse Group has developed an electric delivery truck that incorporates a drone docking station on the vehicle When the truck gets to the delivery route the drone an eightpropeller vehicle called the HorseFly can then be used to deliver packages using GPS to the recipients house Its a combination that conceivably could save the Postal Service time and money and ultimately reduce maintenance costs
